comments.body: Would be good to add another column with large decimal and one double value. The type then should be Double.

Maybe you meant adding some more data that can be inferred as `LongType` or `DoubleType` in the test file to check type inference correctly?

I updated the test data and this produces the schema below:

``` bash
root
 |-- decimal-precision: decimal(20,0) (nullable = true)
 |-- decimal-scale: decimal(18,17) (nullable = true)
```
